tasks.title: Integration with Real Estate APIs
tasks.description: Develop adapters for real estate APIs to fetch property data dynamically.

tasks.title: Geographical Mapping
tasks.description: Integrate with mapping services (e.g., Mapbox, Folium) to visualize property locations in the UI.

tasks.title: International Market Support
tasks.description: Enhance data processing to handle different market formats, currencies, and address standards.

tasks.title: Sentiment Analysis
tasks.description: Add sentiment analysis module using specialized LLM fine-tuning for property descriptions.

tasks.title: Automated Test Suite
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive automated test suite and perform user testing to address limited testing constraint.
